name: Iphone 17

description: iPhone 17 Pro delivers stunning performance, pro-level cameras, immersive display, and all-day battery life with premium design.

description: Huawei Mate XT combines cutting-edge foldable technology, sleek build, strong performance, and immersive display for next-generation mobile experiences.

description: Huawei Nova 12i offers stylish design, smooth performance, advanced cameras, and long-lasting battery perfect for everyday smartphone users.

name: Samsung S24 Ultra
description: Samsung S24 Ultra redefines flagship smartphones with pro-level cameras, advanced performance, and enduring battery for professionals.

name: Samsung Z Fold 6
